metadata.title: Contact Us - Astrocartography Calculator Support
metadata.description: Get in touch with the Astrocartography Calculator team. Send us your questions, feedback, or support requests. We'll respond within 1-2 business days.

title: Contact Us
subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
description: Have a question, suggestion, or need help? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible, typically within 1-2 business days.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us more about your question or feedback...

form.success_detail: Thank you for contacting us. We've received your message and will respond to you within 1-2 business days. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.
form.error_detail: We encountered an issue sending your message. Please try again in a moment, or contact us directly at support@astrocarto.org if the problem persists.

alternative.title: Alternative Contact Methods
alternative.response: We typically respond within 1-2 business days.

items.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
items.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 1-2 business days. For urgent matters, please mention it in your message subject line.

items.question: What should I include in my message?
items.answer: Please include as much detail as possible about your question or issue, including any relevant screenshots, error messages, or steps to reproduce the problem.

items.question: Can I get technical support for using the calculator?
items.answer: Absolutely! We're here to help with any questions about using the Astrocartography Calculator, interpreting results, or troubleshooting issues.
